coding_practice.title: Valid Palindrome II
coding_practice.description: Given a string s, return true if the s can be palindrome after deleting at most one character from it.
coding_practice.constraints:
1 <= s.length <= 10^5
s consists of lowercase English letters.
coding_practice.explanation: 1. 使用雙指針 i, j 從字符串兩端向中間遍歷。\n2. 如果遇到不相等的字符，嘗試刪除左邊或右邊字符，檢查剩下的子串是否為回文。\n3. 若整個遍歷過程沒有遇到違反回文的情況，返回 True。
